source.name: City Issues & Problems
source.description:
This data set contains city issues across the world. Issues like Blocked Bike lanes
Broken Windows
Idling Vehicles
City Potholes
Sanitation
Traffic Light Timing Problem
Park Maintenance
Refuse Collection
Excessive Number of Animals
Cruelty to Animals
Molestation
Traffic Enforcement
Cracked Sidewalks
Inadequate Public Transport
Organized Crime
Illegal dumping
Noisy Neighborhood
Snow Removal
or General Requests
